  • PacerCMS 0.2 Alpha Released

PacerCMS 0.2 Alpha Released

Again, this isn't ready for prime time. If you like what you see (and enjoy tweaking code for your own purposes), please feel free to use and test PacerCMS. If you really like it, shoot me an e-mail and we'll set you up to start contributing back to the project.

The INSTALL folder has more information about getting PacerCMS up and running.

This Release:

  • Added 'Pages' to the admin area
  • Moved configuration information to config.php in admin and public 'includes' folders
  • More attempts to remove references to testing environment.
  • A few bug tweaks

Download PacerCMS 0.2 Alpha
